lead_paragraph: The Legal Aid Society wants to force the agency to disclose information on officers’ punishments for wrongdoing on the job since 2011.

headline.print_headline: Suit Seeks to Shed Light on Discipline of Officers
headline.main: Suit Challenges Secrecy on New York Police Disciplinary Records

snippet: The Legal Aid Society wants to force the agency to disclose information on officers’ punishments for wrongdoing on the job since 2011....
abstract: Legal Aid Society files lawsuit against New York Police Dept in effort to force agency to disclose information about how its police officers are disciplined for wrongdoing; lawsuit is latest salvo in ongoing dispute over transparency in officer accountability.
